scripts.start: rimraf dist && npm run build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node server.js
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && npm run build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node server.js
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config build/webpack.client.config.js --progress --hide-modules && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config build/webpack.server.config.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config build/webpack.client.config.js --progress --hide-modules && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config build/webpack.server.config.js --progress --hide-modules
